Description.Text:
Position The hotel is located about 1 km from the beach and 2 km from the city center.
Restaurant Renowned restaurant with possibilty of a la carte menu with direct payment. The breakfast buffet is available until 11:00.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Swimming pool free equipped with deck chairs and sunumbrellas from mid-May to late September. In charge: tennis 400 m, riding about 3 km, golf (9 holes) about 10 km, bike and scooter about 1.5 Km
